Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Provides that certain sex offenders who are released on parole or sentenced to probation may not enter public, association or free libraries
Summary: Provides that certain sex offenders who are released on parole may not enter public, association or free libraries.
LawCode: Amd ยง259-c, Exec L; amd ยง65.10, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the penal law, in relation to preventing certain sex offenders who are released on parole or sentenced to probation from entering public, association or free libraries
